Our purpose

To create
the extraordinary

We exist to entertain. We are for inspiring stories that connect with one’s soul. We are for extraordinary experiences.

Our mission,
what we seek to
become

The world’s leading global content company from the emerging markets. As a corporation, we will be driven by content leadership based on innovation and creativity. Our focus will be on growth while delivering exceptional value to our customers, viewers and stakeholders.

Our values,
the bedrock of our culture

  • A
  • C
  • H
  • I
  • E
  • V
  • E

Accountability
for Results

Take the Ownership of decisions/actions for self and team,ensuring timely delivery of commitment made with hifh quality results.

Customer First

To anticipate, understand and meet the needs of internal/external customers, ensuring high level of service delivery keeping in mind the customer first principle

Humility, respect and
intergrity

To respect and honor each individual's unique talents, life choices & work styles. To be fair,humble,honest,transparent and ethical in conduct

Innovate and solve
big problems

Identify and resolve problems which have high impact on business by providing innovative solutions and ensuring implementation with excellent execution.

Endeavor for big, hairy,
audacious goals

To set for ourselves clear, compelling and audacious goals. Transcending the fear of faliure,criticism, and ambiguity in an effort to set and acheive bigger goals.

Velocity and agility

To continue to deliver on responsibilities while anticipating and responding to the evolving environment.

Embrace frugality

Focusing on need-based resource utilization and to do more with less, while simultaneously working on continuous improvement and on-time delivery.

Our beliefs,
the code we abide by

Entertainment inspires

We know that entertainment is one of the most powerful forms of inspiration on the planet. Stories shape lives. Gives people ambition to be all that they can be. Brings ideas and opportunities to the table. We’re here to be entertainment world leaders. A powerhouse for creativity.

Stronger together

We’re here to bring people together. To unite people. To help them build together, celebrate together, enjoy life together. We’re greater than the sum of parts. A united portfolio of brands bringing together one of the widest ranges of entertainment choices on the planet.

Celebrating the world

We seek to bring the whole world to India and India to the world. The world is a wonderful place full of colour and life. Teeming with ideas, adventures and challenges. There are endless stories from near and far, stories to be told; of lives led and yet to be led, something to make us laugh or to cry. Something to lose ourselves in or set ourselves up. We tell the worlds tales from the tallest to the truest.

We mean business

Founded by Subhash Chandra, we’ve been pioneering new entertainment experiences for over 27 years. Challenging convention and ourselves to think bigger and change the game. We’re in love with the new and the next. Ambitious for our customers and the wider world. Constantly looking to the future. Innovating and improving at every turn.

Extraordinary is a
continuous journey.

  1. ZEE 1.0
    Witnessed the inception of ZEE TV in 1992 as India's 1st private satellite Hindi channel Sparking a revolution in the country
  2. ZEE 2.0
    Dominated by our competitors introducing new formats and us playing catch-up. A phase that made us learn by questioning ourselves
  3. ZEE 3.0
    Saw us expand and grow as well as restucture some of our businesses, while finding our true identity and the content that best resonated with our audiences.
  4. ZEE 4.0
    The future of entertainment
